resources.string:
When enabled, will show incoming call origin or outgoing call destination country, its associated map and/or local time on remote side.
 
 Features:
 -------------
 -- Configurable vertical position and time to show the country name and map.
 -- Configurable to show the country name in country's official language as well (where applicable)
 -- Configurable to show the layer only for international calls.
 -- Supports state names and maps for US and Canada (NANP).
 -- Supports local time on remote side.

When enabled, the following rules apply for showing country information:
 
 -- When there is no associated native country name, the English name will be displayed instead.
 -- Local time on remote side will only be displayed if the remote party is registered in a different country.
 -- Daylight Saving Time (DST) is taken into consideration according to the local rules.
 -- Interstate calls for US and Canada are considered "international".
 
 Known issues:
 -------------------
 -- Outgoing calls hung before layer timeout might still display the layer until its timeout expires.
